trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to open a system mutex, semaphore, or event wait handle that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试打开不存在的系统互斥体、信号量或事件等待句柄时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>, <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>, and <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle> classes can represent named system synchronization objects.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>， <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>，和<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>类可以表示已命名的系统同步对象。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Threading.Mutex.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or the <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to open a named system object that does not exist, a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Threading.Mutex.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，或<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法打开不存在，已命名的系统对象<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "No handle of the given name exists."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"不存在句柄的给定名称。"的新实例的属性

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The system-supplied error message string.
trans-unit.target: 系统提供的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException> initialized with this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException>使用此构造函数初始化。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 存放有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象，它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。
